actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the appointment of a special delegation to host a delegation of members of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the Senate to appoint a special delegation of Senators to host a delegation of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China. Provides for the payment of expenditures of such Senate delegation.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the appointment of a special delegation to host a delegation of members of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.
